_header: Our Father that art in heaven anon
_description: The Pater Noster — three quatrains in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Oure fader þat art in heuene ononIblissed be þi
                    name…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…In fonding of þe fendes mithBut fro harm þu child
                    vus alle
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 29.
